title: @Riot Gehirn could I play with you for my 1000th win?
body: I'm just got over 500 wins in normal games and was wondering if you could play with me. I have no friends but we can mount up together and charge into battle and have fun and play together.

replies.body: @Riot Gehirn can I play with you too I am a really big fan
But not at the same time as this Gromethius kid..........
Seems like no one has joined the conversation yet, be the first to comment below!
